summary.span: 表示與 相關的參數集合，以及它們對 中資料行的個別對應。

span.span: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an and their respective mappings to columns in a .

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的參數數目必須等於命令文字內的參數預留位置的數字，或是.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 會引發錯誤。The number of parameters in the collection must equal the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, or else the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC raises an error. ## Examples 下列範例會假設資料來源有一個名為資料表**MoneyTable**和名為預存程序**MoneyProcedure**，其定義如下：The following example assumes that the data source has a table named **MoneyTable** and a stored procedure named **MoneyProcedure**, which are defined as follows: ``` CREATE TABLE MoneyTable (col1 int, col2 smallmoney, col3 decimal); CREATE PROC MoneyProcedure (@p1 int, @p2 smallmoney, @p3 decimal) AS INSERT INTO MyTable VALUES (@p1, @p2, @p3); ``` 此範例會建立參數並呼叫**MoneyProcedure**預存程序。The example creates parameters and calls the **MoneyProcedure** stored procedure. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請謹慎使用這個多載方法，以指定整數參數值。Use caution when using this overload of the method to specify integer parameter values. 因為此多載會採用`value`型別的，您必須將整數值轉換時輸入的值為零，如下列 C# 範例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integer value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果您不會執行這項轉換，編譯器會假設您嘗試呼叫多載。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the overload.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會搜尋與給定內。The following example searches for an with a given within an . 如果此參數存在，此範例會顯示的名稱和參數的索引。If the parameter exists, the example displays the name and index of the parameter. 如果參數不存在，則這個範例會顯示錯誤。If the parameter does not exist, the example displays an error. 這個範例假設已經存在。This example assumes that an has already been created.
